name: Dots: Revamped!
detailed_description:
ABOUT THE GAME
This is a massive EXPANSION upon the Dots: Revamped! browser game, and you can only play it HERE!

Gobble up Dots to fill your Rainbow Meter, then destroy your enemies with RAINBOW POWER!
In NewGame+ upgrades are taken away and replaced with Punishments! The bigger the punishment you choose, the more points you get per Dot!

FEATURES
Over 20 characters to unlock!
14 unlockable abilities!
3+ Gameplay Modes!
NewGame+
More than DOUBLE the playtime of the original release!

PLAY FOR FREE!
I encourage you to TRY THE GAME FOR FREE and if you like it; consider supporting the developer. Pay what you want, that includes $0.00, no hard feelings!


WANT MORE?
If you would like to see more content and updates, reach out to me on twitter @Starblinky and let me know what you'd like to see.

short_description: Based on the classic Flash Game Dots! Challenging collect-em & dodge-em game. TONS of unlockables!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Duel-core CPU @ 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or dedicated graphics card with 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 207 MB available space
